creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Hilly landscape with four figures, a shrine in red-orange, and grazing oxen; gold covers majority of surface and is applied in powdered form, flakes, and strips; slivers of silver also present
medium: Ink, color, gold, and silver on gilded paper
title: Scenes from the Tales of Saigyō
